website_summaries.verdict: This option stands out for its sleek look and solid design. Customers love the easy-to-read display that remains hidden until you step on the scale.
pros: Good to go right out of the box, although there is a link to instructions if you need them
The display is hidden until you use it and features big, backlit numbers
cons: Some buyers report problems with inaccurate readings

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this bathroom scale on February 6, 2018 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bathroom scale on February 6, 2018. I really am unhappy with it ... you can weigh yourself three or four times within minutes and get a different reading each time. This scale is worthless. I would give it less than one star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after few months.
customer_reviews.text: Update: it’s been a few months of having this... I hardly ever even use it, and the numbers suddenly jump around each time I’ve use it this morning. I keep very accurate count due to weight loss. First I stepped on it, and 145- then 149, 148 and 145 again .. yesterday I was 142.......after fasting- I certainly didn’t gain near 8lbs.... lol I even changed the surface in which I use it one several times..... very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Cali35

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Scale - only one minor annoyance
customer_reviews.text: Great, quick reading scale. The only issue I have is that it remembers the weight for a few minutes. For example if you step on it and it reads 182.5 - then you get off, wait a few seconds, get back on - it will "load" and hit the same exact number. So if you think you stepped on it wrong or something and you want a "re-reading" - you have to wait a few minutes so it doesn't remember the last reading. All else is top notch though - nice screen, quick read, no need to wait for anything, the weight comes on right away.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic accurate scale even for a big guy
customer_reviews.text: I recently found my old scale to be off by as much as 15 pounds when I went to the Dr. I needed something that had a small footprint and found this scale through searching. When I purchased this scale I was over 300 LBS. As of right now I weight less than 300 pounds and there have been no problems with measuring or the device breaking. The description said it will hold up to 400 LBS. The only thing I had to do to make this scale work out of the box was remove the plastic liner holding the battery in place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sylvan BellTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale because it's competitively priced, nice looking, and is reasonably compact while still accommodating my size thirteen feet. It also appears to be accurate. When I came directly home from a visit to the doctor's office, it displayed a weight that was within .2 pounds of the scale at the doctor's office. A fifth of a pound is close enough for me. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wildly inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The scale is inaccurate and inconsistent. Stepping on the scale 10 times in a row produced 10 different results ranging +/- 3.5 lbs. Big-time fail. I could forgive the inaccuracy if the scale produced consistent results, but it does not. This is the first item I am returning on Amazon. My advice...avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: hcktstc

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. What I am frustrated with is the weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and was well packaged. Looks great. What I am frustrated with is the weight is inconsistent, and will give me 3 different weights if I weigh myself 3 times in a row. So if you’re looking for a general idea of how much you weigh this will do, but if you want accuracy and and exact weight you and count on, this isn’t the scale for you.
customer_reviews.author: Thee Jessica Bee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale a lot so far! It's very easy to read, and I like that you don't have to do that awkward shuffle in turning it on before you weigh yourself - you can just step right on and your weight displays very quickly. It shipped quickly and the packaging was very attractive as well. My only complaint would be that apparently my previous scale was inaccurate as I seem to have gained 10 lbs in a day! Lol. Not this scale's fault obviously, my previous one sucked. But that is a bit of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: kapplejack

customer_reviews.title: I'm not Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scale and for the first few weeks of worked good, went to weigh in the next week stepped on and it kept coming up err so I shut it down and turned it back on same thing err, did it 1more time samething, missed me off, so I looked up greater goods to review what should I do (nothing) so I contacted the seller, she stated to change batteries, okay bought new rechargeables put them in and now when it comes on and you step on it, it gives you a weight but changes from high to low constantly now it's pass the return window and I'm stuck with something that doesn't work. Totally Pissed
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Pay the money
customer_reviews.text: This had me thinking I was loosing weight. I would step on the scale every morning out of bed and it would give me a reading. And before I got in the shower I will step on the scale and it would give me a different reading. And out of the shower it would give me a different reading. And I will go the entire day without eating not because I didn't want to eat but because I didn't have a chance to eat at work, come home and weigh at a different reading. NEVER within my weight radius. Tried different batteries to het different results everytime. Not accurate at all. Jus a wide estimate
customer_reviews.author: Tah B.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I had this scale for one week, used it twice and it gave me accurate readings both times. After that week it would no longer turn on. I figured the batteries it came with were just defective so grabbed a couple new ones and popped them in. Within a few seconds the entire scale started to become hot and the new batteries started to melt together! This is a huge safety hazard!!! They say "you get what you pay for" and in this case it is very true! Cheap, cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Hugely In accurate  readings
customer_reviews.text: Stopped reading accurately after a few months. I bought this scale just to weigh myself from time to time but the readings have never been accurate. Now it’s to the point where the readings are over 10 pounds lighter than it should be, causing issues with my keto diet. I had to order an entirely different brand scale which now weighs accurately and this one is going in the trash. I tried contacting their customer service about this to maybe see if it could be calibrated and received no reply from them. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: Desze Adams

customer_reviews.title: Scale stopped working after a month. One minute it ...
customer_reviews.text: Scale stopped working after a month. One minute it would say one weight the next week it would say another. I could be mistaken but you don't drop forty pounds in one week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale for anyone who doesn't want all the extra frills, but still wants something that looks really nice. It's sleek & sharp looking, compact, display is bright an easy to see. If you move it around, make sure you let it sit for a minute or two before you weigh yourself. Full disclosure: I received this scale for free after purchasing other Greater Goods products. I purchased the body fat/bluetooth scale of theirs which I love and highly recommend if you like the extra data & ability to sync with an app easily. This scale is nearly identical in look, but just gives a simple weight readout.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Good scale but have to weigh myself twice for correct weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale in January 2019, still works fine. I love the scale but I have to weigh myself twice. First weight is off, then I wait for the light to go off and get on again and it shows the correct weight the second time. Weight different is 3 pounds off. A little annoying but from reading the reviews I know the second weight is the correct one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Results same as my Dr and came with batteries
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if those with bad reviews were unlucky to get a faulty one, because mine worked fine. My daughter and I just came back from the Dr from physicals and this scale gave the exact readings theirs did with no problem. It is a plus that it showed pounds (lbs) versus kg so we didn't have to adjust anything. Also a plus, batteries were included in scale already and all we have to do to turn it on each day is step on. I recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: apcrays

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Read!
customer_reviews.text: The day I received my new scale I had just come home from a doctors appointment so I jumped right on to see what kind of a reading I would get. Much to my surprise it was within a tenth of a pound. I was very happy to see the accuracy of my scale. I love the fact that the numbers are so easy to read against the smooth black finish. So far I am very happy with this purchase and the fact that they donate a portion to charity was the deciding factor on choosing this model.
customer_reviews.author: J. MarinoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not very accurate...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I get on this scale in the morning, it always says my weight is 3-4 lbs higher than it should be. I step off, let the number clear, and the second time I step on it, I get a lower (accurate) number. I don't like having to waste time waiting for the first erroneous readout to clear so I can step back on and see the correct results. Cross-referenced with a scale at my doctor's office. I gave three stars for a sleek black design and durability, but I'd rather have a scale that tells me the right weight the first time, especially when I'm in a hurry in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love the instant weight, and seems very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really like not having to "tap" it on and wait for it to be ready. It also matches my daily weight closely with what my older scale says. I *did* have to "zero it out" when I first got it. (Step on the scale, then step off as soon as it starts showing a weight. It will then read zero. Let it turn off, and then proceed to weight yourself.)
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne L.

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful and sleek; unable to find anything that matches the quality at this price
customer_reviews.text: quite frankly the best scale i have owned in recent history, its beautiful and looks very nice sitting in your bathroom. app is also not cheaply done compared to another scale ive used for the same price and even looks better. packaging is very professional and really makes it feel like it was worth it. 10/10 would only purchase this again, dont look at any other product
customer_reviews.author: Pramey Das

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive but accurate
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I hated this scale at first because it gave me wildly different results at first, we’re talking 20 pounds within one minute. I’ve seen similar comments. Word of advice: stand centered on the scale, upright, still, arms by your side, face forward. This is what you’re supposed to do with a scale anyway, it just happens this one is sensitive. Don’t worry about looking at the number while you’re weighing yourself, just give a few seconds, step off, and read it then. It’s not going anywhere fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Working Scale!
customer_reviews.text: Considered a scale that was a few dollars cheaper, but I came across this one and it is great. Even the packaging was better than average. Another reviewer made a really good point that I agree with - the numbers on this scale are white with no back light, this makes using the scale so much easier. It does have to be on a level surface, but what scale doesn’t? Something that I really like, but didn’t know when purchasing this product is that this company gives back with every purchase. And they encourage the consumer to get involved so they can give back to their charity of choice. That is pretty darn cool.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINALBB

customer_reviews.title: Mostly accurate?
customer_reviews.text: If you want something accurate 100% of the time, probably look elsewhere. 7/10 times it seems accurate. The remaining three times, you’re gonna be 10 pounds lighter than you are. So if you’re smart enough to know you didn’t lose ten pounds overnight, this should be fine. I didn’t return it for that reason. The price fits & I know how to get what I need out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this scale for less than a week, but from what I can tell so far, it is of good quality, is accurate, fast, and looks very nice. I like the sleek, modern look - and it doesn’t beg to be the focal point of your bathroom, which it shouldn’t. Plus, it doesn’t squeak or feel like it’s bending when you stand on it. It feels like good, solid glass. I’ve weighed myself at different times of the day, expecting to see a lighter weight in the morning vs the evening, which I did, therefore I believe it to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: It readjusts the weight 2 - 4 lbs lower at will.
customer_reviews.text: I was after a basic scale, and that is what I got. This unit had been returned at least once, so I have no idea how long the batteries will last. More irritating is that if you tap your foot on it, the scale readjusts from 2 to 4 pounds lower. The only way to correct it is to remove the batteries to reset it.
customer_reviews.author: TravlynWomyn

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last. SEE UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: A person from Greater Goods contacted me regarding the problem and is sending me a replacement scale, at no charge! Great customer service! This scale was fine at first, but when the original batteries died, I replaced them with some better batteries, but they died after only a few days. Thinking that maybe I got some bad batteries, I put some new Energizers in it. Again they died within a few days. I guess I have to buy a new scale now.
customer_reviews.author: A. Altenbach

customer_reviews.title: remarkably accurate, precise and consistent
customer_reviews.text: I have had this scale about three weeks now. It is remarkably accurate, precise and consistent. It gives the exact same weight repeatedly when used in rapid succession. It also agrees very closely to the Doctor's office scales (which rarely agree with one another). I have accidentally tripped on it and into it in the dark, all with absolutely no ill effects (to the scale). It remains accurate and consistent despite the abuse and regardless of where I relocate it. It fully merits a five star rating regardless of price. It also merits five stars for value. Highly, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year... Wait I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working, tried changing batteries and nothing. I weigh around 110 and my husband weighs around 155 so I don't think we were to heavy for it. Just a crappy product. ***edit*** I'm an idiot... I thought I had put 4 rechargeable batteries in it (energizer) and I had only 2 along with 2 dead batteries. Not only did it work just fine, but there customer service team responded as soon as I emailed them. The customer service team did state that Duracell batteries do not work and is an issue they are working on.
customer_reviews.author: carrie smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very nice looking, I love that it’s digital. I so bad wanted to love this product, but it unfortunately doesn’t work for me. Every time I get on it the numbers say something different. It’s not true to my weight at all. It could say that I weigh 145 and then five minutes later it will say 150 or 152 for example. I keep it on a flat, hard wood surface. I have even moved it to various locations inside my home, with still no luck. Wish I could return it but I ripped the box opened, so excited to see it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: VERY PRETTY VERY INVITING
customer_reviews.text: SOME SCALE YOU JUST don't want to step on, they take time to react and sometime they don't react at all. and most of them some how ugly. this one is simply nice, you want a number and there is a number the moment you step on. and only number is what you will see. nice packaging,on the box it says something really funny. not going to reveal that here though...
customer_reviews.author: Gisele15

customer_reviews.title: A great scale and unbelievable customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleek scale. I have had it for a year and the battery reading was low. I had trouble opening the battery compartment and emailed the company for help. ( Usually such emails go the Bermuda Triangle in my experience.) Within minutes “Katy” emailed me and asked some details. She offered to replace the scale immediately !! Knowing this, I worked on the battery door a little harder and it opened . I told her the replacement wasn’t necessary but thought I must write this review because of the amazing customer care. If every company was run like this wouldn’t it be terrific?!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: The Tesla of bathroom scales
customer_reviews.text: It's just a sleek black square. Very elegant. High quality construction. Step on it and large clear bright numbers appear. It gets your weight quickly and blinks. Display stays on after you get off then disappears. Haven't tested accuracy but it's very consistent. Never thought I'd get enthusiastic about a bathroom scale.
customer_reviews.author: I bought this

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! scale . . .
customer_reviews.text: I have like 4 scales & this 1 is the ONLY 1 I use now. 1 I took apart because it quit. The others 'work' but I don't think they're right, at all. This scale works & I trust the result. Oh, AND I'm losing weight, too. I like this scale, I'd buy it again, & I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Steedley

customer_reviews.title: Reviews Were Good. Bought It. It Arrived Quickly. It Works Great. Okay?
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews, liked them, bought it, it arrived quickly, setup was a breeze (I opened the box, put it on the floor, stepped on it, it worked). What more do you need to know? :-) Oh! Here's something! It's VERY attractive. Slim and sleek and black and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great simple scale for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the scale for only a couple of days so my review is limited. It was packaged very good and arrived as promised. Its lite weight and has a sleek attractive design. I really like the simplicity to use it. Tap with your foot. When the zeros appear just step on the scale. Tge led numbers are big,bright and easy to read. A big plus for me. The base is stable and plenty of room to plant both feet firmly. I also liked there was already a battery installed. So far so good. Would recommend to potential buyer and a great price to.
customer_reviews.author: Denali Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its accurate..
customer_reviews.text: Tbh, I'm not sure if this is super accurate with my weight..I have to use it twice, once i turn it on and again right after the first.. so since it tells me 2 completely different results for my weight im stuck knowing if i weigh more or less.. Ex. First time ( 165 lb ) second time ( 161 lb )
customer_reviews.author: jaqueline

customer_reviews.title: Weighs accurately--Battery life a bit short
customer_reviews.text: This scale is attractive,sleek and substantial. It weighs accurately. I am not impressed with the battery life as I only use the scale a couple times a month and had to replace the batteries after about 6 months of use. Maybe that's normal...but I have had alarm clock batteries that lasted a lot longer...so I guess that's what I'm comparing it to. It just seemed too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Skole

customer_reviews.title: Quick response thin scale
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scale to use for my science classroom (because its cheap and kids break things) but I liked it so much that I bought a second one for my house. Quick, consistent feedback for mass (I use the kg setting for class) and very durable. Withstand consistent use of high school students of all sizes standing on it repeatedly and 5 gallon buckets of sand being placed on it. At home, it fits well under my bathroom vanity and works well for my family of 4. I like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: zzp

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy another digital scale. This one ended up in the trash within the first few days after arriving at my door. Everytime I weighed myself it came back with a different reading and the range of difference was substantial. I set it on an even flat hard surface so I know the surface wasn't the problem. I ended up going to Walmart and buying a normal scale with the 'old fashioned' analog readout and am quite happy with it. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck S.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so inaccurate. You can stand on it five times in each time the number will be vastly different.
customer_reviews.author: calibee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very stylish/modern and the display is easy to read. The price seemed right, too. I bought two of them. I just liked it :) I'm not sure how accurate this scale is, but then, again, I'm not sure I want to know precisely how many ounces I'm overweight either. If it's a pound or two under or over, who cares - it's not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: LPNerd

customer_reviews.title: Great people scale, great luggage scale
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking scale that works well, with the caveat that it has to be on a level surface to have repeatable readings; easy and accurate with my weight. I used it recently to weigh my packed suitcase, and tested it several times to find if the reading would vary, but the readings were completely repeatable. The nice thing is that you can just rest the suitcase on the scale, and when the reading pops up, remove the case and still see the reading.
customer_reviews.author: thefarb

customer_reviews.title: Scale is EXTREMELY inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for little over a week and it sucks. I have to step on this scale 10 times just to get 5 different readings. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great digital body weight scale
customer_reviews.text: Like this scale a lot - simple digital body weight scale with very clear weight display and easy to set for lbs or kgs (push button is on top back of scale) with no additional unneeded features! The Walgreens digital scale worked well for a decent period but it had too many unneeded features for me and would also periodically and suddenly convert to kgs and I'd have to figure out how to set it on lbs again - drove me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Don R.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive scale, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive scale that is rated to 400 lbs. I'm a large guy who weighs over 200, and the first scale I got from them stopped working after a couple of weeks (it was telling me I weighed 47 pounds). GreaterGoods reached out to me, and quickly sent me a replacement that has been working well. Although I had an issue with the product, I have to say that their customer service went well above and beyond what I expected from them. They wanted to make things right, and they were very responsive. So even if something does go sideways, know that they'll stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stefanik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and accurate
customer_reviews.text: The scale is very accurate and easy to read. Sometimes I don't like how accurate (lol) it is and I'll swear it much be off! When that happens I grab my 20 lbs bowflex dumbbell (the flexweights)and it's always right at 20 or 20.2. It's never been any different than that. The numbers are large and easy to read. I don't use the ap, so I'm unable to comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: First off, the box that it came in was not correct. I could clearly tell something was “off”. I opened the re-taped box, pulled out the scale and a handwritten torn piece of paper fell to the ground with a name & phone number. Odd. I weighed myself and knew something was clearly off. I was at the doctor a few hours before and it was 7 pounds different. Seven. No way I lost 7 pounds in a few hours. I put actual dumbbells on the scale and it was 8 pounds off. I put the dumbbells on my current scale- off by 1 pound. Returning the scale & Sticking with the one I currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Often gives different values.
customer_reviews.text: This scale often tells me very different weights when I step on and off of it and back on. The difference can be up to 5 lbs. it’s quite frustrating because I don’t know what one to go by...I don’t know, maybe I just need to change the battery...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sleek scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale!!! I searched so long for something sleek and minimalist to put in my bathroom. This one fits the bill perfectly. It's really quite pretty and it blends in with my bathroom nicely. No more hiding the scale in the cabinet! I also wanted a scale that would just tell me my weight, without any of the unnecessary bells and whistles (like bone density measurements or muscle mass or what have you). This one just tells your weight accurately. Simple. Plus, this company donates some of their profit to charity! And the packaging is really nice. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, accurate, and easier to use than others!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a 10 year old digital scale with this one. Low profile, accurate to tenths, and very pretty (my wife said). Very accurate too. Once you step on it the display will fluctuate and flash until done. Then you can step off of it and read it if you need to as it displays the weight for a few seconds before going blank again.
customer_reviews.author: BSD

customer_reviews.title: Loved the scale, but it just stopped working roughly a year in.
customer_reviews.text: The scale is slick, well designed and I really liked it. However, it just stopped working correctly. For some reason the tare weight keeps compounding, so the weight readings are off the charts. There does not appear to be a way to manually re-tare.. or fix the problem. I just contacted the company to ask if there is something we can do to fix, we will see if they reply. Loved the product, but it should really last longer than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful scale, but does not weigh accurately. Gave a different weight every time you stepped on the scale.
customer_reviews.author: GCP

customer_reviews.title: Weight what?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I lost 6lbs over night that I had to step on it again. Sure enough I didn't lose that much. Tested it out a few times and mostly it reads the same but every so often I get a different weight. 95% of the time it does its job. Looks like picture.
customer_reviews.author: MMJ

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working properly after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, worked fine for a while. Started showing "Lo" messages more and more frequently as time went on starting after about eight or nine months of use. Now (almost a year in) it's impossible to get a reading. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and lightweight design. Only issue is that the battery runs out within 2 weeks, only after 2 uses. It doesn't seem like the scale turns off completely, or something is draining the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: Neat looks, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The scale looks better than I expected, with a smooth black surface. The screen lights up and only becomes visible when stepping on the scale. The weight reading is available quickly, and stays on for a little while after stepping off. It's convenient that the scale comes with batteries. So far, I haven't encountered accuracy issues (readings are the same when stepping on & off multiple times), but I don't have another scale to compare with.
customer_reviews.author: __name__

customer_reviews.title: Great scales. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: I ;bought this scale after returning another one because the dial was too hard to read. I've also had problems with the setup of some scales that have oodles of features. This scale is easy to read. That's it. No special features to confuse you. Just step on it and your weight appears in numbers that are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek set of scales by a company committed to helping others!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to unpack and looks great on my bathroom floor. Just got it today but it had a similar weight to what I had fully clothed at MD. Easy to switch to pounds. Glad to be supporting a company that has integrity and compassion for others. I will purchase items from this company again. Update - I have been using the scale and it is accurate and easy to read. I highly recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Mukti and Dharma

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very slick looking, integrates well into a modern home. Our scale looks like an iPad! It works perfectly: registers your weight quickly and then locks it in so it doesn't fluctuate as you move around. It's durable too, even though it's made of glass. And it's pretty thin, so it will store away easily under a bed or what-have-you. Comes with temporary tattoos!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Goza

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent and inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Within the first few minutes of using, scale was giving wildly inaccurate weights. It was showing 70 some pounds when nothing was on the scale. I followed the directions to recalibrate and now it’s close but gives me a different reading each time I step on it, back to back tries, sometimes changing up to 5 pounds. I emailed customer service and have not had a prompt reply. Not sure if it was even received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love the color and looks of it! Was exactly as advertised and it gets the job done. I honestly have no idea on accuracy cause I dont need it to be pinpoint accurate just checking my progress on weightloss lol, but my guess would be its pretty dang good.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate readings
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically this scale is beautiful, but unfortunately the readings are off. I have taken to taking several readings every morning and am getting readings that are as much as seven pounds off even though I am taking them a few seconds apart. At first I thought maybe my floor is uneven so I tried moving the scale to different locations around my apartment where I knew the floor was level and it didn’t help. Sometimes two different readings in the same location will be wildly different. The readings are inaccurate and unreliable and I‘m very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sumana C.

customer_reviews.title: This product is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst scale I've ever purchased. Literally 32 days after purchasing the scale I realized we had changed the batteries twice because it would read "Lo" and wouldn't work. Now it's been 2 months and 5 battery changes total. It is also now not reading accurate because if you step on it 3 different times in the same setting 2 out of 3 times the weigh in amount is different. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Upset is an understatement...
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving two stars because the scale worked accurately for a short period of time. This scale is horrible! I’ve had it for a year and I didn’t start using it until 6 months ago. It worked fine until approximately a week ago. The scale changes lbs drastically! It can range from 15lbs less or 9lbs more! I am so upset because I have been on a weight loss journey and losing more weight on a very low calories diet is what dictates how my meals are prepped. This is so disappointing. I would never recommend this scale!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Couple

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed.. if accuracy isn't important.
customer_reviews.text: The Pros: * Solid Construction - felt like it was built to last * Simple Aesthetics - it looked good * Reasonably Priced The Cons: * Scale was wildly inaccurate - Variance of 2+ lbs when weighing myself three separate times within 30min. I was wearing the same clothes, didn't eat or use the restroom, and the scale was on the same hard/level surface. I would highly recommend getting this scale as long as you're not buying it to get consistently accurate measurements. /s
customer_reviews.author: Nâthaniel

customer_reviews.title: Scale does not give accurate weight
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it was wonderful now it gives different weight each time I use it I purchased in 2018 I believed it was on warrantee and I emailed the Balance people did not get any reply from them I thought I had purchased good scale but so I guess I wasted money on this item from greater goods I will have to look else where better scale and it have not owned it that long
customer_reviews.author: SUNITI  P. DUTTA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first, it took a bit to find a spot to get an accurate reading. This worked a bit then suddenly, every time I stepped on the scale (even minutes apart) readings were 5-6 pounds different from each other. Shortly after this happened, readings became so random, ranging from 58 lbs to 349 lbs (I am about 120). Since that, it stopped working completely. I’ve only had the scale a couple of months, so there is no good excuse for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. The only downside for me is that it has to be on a hard surface (not carpeting or a rug), which makes it a bit slippery on my tile bathroom floor. Everywhere else is carpeted.
customer_reviews.author: BMR

customer_reviews.title: Quit working! Accurate, lightweight and modern design, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Nine months later it quit working! Either stays on 0 or gives a different weight every time. This scale is very slim and lightweight. The readings are very accurate. Most cheaper digital scales will slightly change the reading. This one does not. I think it has an attractive design and is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gibson

customer_reviews.title: So far,so great!
customer_reviews.text: My old scale pooped out after only two years. This one looks great. Best of all my weight(for better or worse) was extremely visible. It is lightweight and it came with batteries. (A miracle) We will see how it holds up, considering it is so low priced! It is lightweight and easily stored. What more could I ask? Let’s see how it holds up. Come back in two years!
customer_reviews.author: TJG

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathroom Scale for the Basic User!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bathroom scale! It is simple and easy to use! Additionally it looks very nice! This bathroom scale does not have features like bluetooth, or any body measurements, but that makes it straight forward and easy. You don't have to scroll through many options or other details to be able to check your weight. It is sleek, easy to use, and great for the basic user!
customer_reviews.author: BWJ84

customer_reviews.title: Digital Scale
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scale. I love the black color as well as the digital display. This scale is very accurate and gets the job done. I was looking for a great affordable scale and that is when I came across this one. Easy set up no complications and easy to clean. What more can you ask for out of a simple scale?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: accurate
customer_reviews.text: I liked this scale it is lightweight and can fit in small corners. When comparing it to other scales it was only one or two ounces off. Because of that I would say it is pretty acuarte. I bought two scales one black and one white they both show the same weight when compared.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lima

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a year. It worked great at first then the number era started jumping around and then it just stopped working. Tried new batteries but it never worked
customer_reviews.author: miana cornell

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from my last scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale and is great! My last scale was fancy and complicated and just didn't work. This scale is easy to use and easy to read. I make sure to put it away when not in use because it's glass, but the design is sleek and fits in my bathroom decor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable digital Scale with a classy design
customer_reviews.text: We love this scale for it's sleek thin design and digital readout that pops out clearly. And, its classy black design look was mistaken by our guess that its an expensive scale. It is very accurate as described in the product detail, as we have compare it with two calibrated industrial scales. This is definitely a great buy and would not think otherwise. We are very satisfied customer with this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I was going to call you and tell you that it didn't work because it registered that I weighed 59lbs. More than once. Then I moved the scale to the kitchen floor and it read 128. Higher that I was use to seeing but more like my normal weight. They want to have a reading before and after urinaton since I am rataining fluid in my legs. Weighing for a pound or two sounds silly but that is what they want to know. I will keep the scale and hope I don't retain fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Johns

customer_reviews.title: Pleased With It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep myself in check while I lose some weight. The readings are fairly accurate. I wouldn't say they're perfect but for the price, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: This scale is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Trust me guys, this isn't just denial! I will step on this scale 3x in a row, and each time it will give me significantly different numbers (off by 2-5lbs each time) I guess its fine if you want a rough estimate of your weight, but definitely not a reliable indicator from day to day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice style and function
customer_reviews.text: Clean lines, bright and easy to read numbers. I simply opened the battery tab to remove the plastic strip. Then I tapped to wake it, and let it stay at 0.0 to calibrate. Ever since it is super consistent. The bad reviews with differing weights are seemigly just not following the advice of the manufacturer to calibrate it. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: wisco

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to give bad reviews, but I must on this one. This scale is horrible. It’s very inconsistent. One minute I weigh 135 and then in 5 minutes, I weigh 129. I’ve had this scale for about a month hoping I could figure something out to make it work properly. Looks like I have to take a loss on it. Throwing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and simple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another scale that conked out. The conked-out scale had features that I never used (multi-user weight tracking, etc.). This one has absolutely no features besides the fact that it weighs you, which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: dweelea

customer_reviews.title: It's finicky,so accuracy is untrustworthy
customer_reviews.text: The scale has a + - by 5 lb. I've resorted to reweighing until I get the same weight consecutively. I also check my weight on my daughter's scale to see if there's an equivalance. It's finicky and not accurate. 2 stars because I can get consistant numbers after 3 -4 tries.
customer_reviews.author: DLJ2

customer_reviews.title: Modern and chic!
customer_reviews.text: After going through so many scales, I finally found one that works consistently and weighs accurately. This scale is streamline if it needs to be tucked away somewhere, but chic enough to leave in plain sight if needful too. The weight comes up almost immediately without the need to step on and off first. I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meemaw23

customer_reviews.title: Ease of usage and easy on to read
customer_reviews.text: Classic looking. Very easy to use. My hubby tapped it once and I had to tell him "no, it doesn't work that way!" lol. You just step on it and boom...you see your numbers. No more tapping, no more guessing if it's correct or not like by stepping on and off. I read lots of reviews before picking this one. Thanks for making a simple product!
customer_reviews.author: Von2222

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bath scale...
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this bath scale. It arrived in good time and was very nicely packed. It is very well made, durable and attractive. It works very well. I think it will last me a long time. The only thing... I wished it would tell me I weigh less than I do!! LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb H

customer_reviews.title: Weigh yourself 3 times every time
customer_reviews.text: This scale is inconsistent. If I weigh myself twice I get the same number two times. If I weigh myself a third time it is 2 lbs lighter. Every time I weigh myself after that it remains 2 lbs lighter. I've changed the batteries and had this scale for some time now, it's been the same since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate weight reading and stable to stand on...
customer_reviews.text: Accurate! I put a 25 lbs dumbbell on it right out of the box and 25 lbs is what it showed. My old scale was off by 1.5 lbs! This scale is also flat and stable, no wiggle at all. Numbers are easy to read and it flashes your weight when it's done. I don't think you can beat the price on this one, particularly since it actually is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: trjk

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t give correct weight
customer_reviews.text: The scale looks great. It’s sleek and the illuminating numbers are easy to read. But it doesn’t do the job that a scale is supposed to do and that is give an accurate reading of your weight. I can step on it 3 times and it will give me 3 separate weight readings all with 5-8 pounds of each other. I didn’t buy a scale for it’s “best guess”. I bought it for accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Priced well and performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: This scale seems like a good choice for me. I've used it a good amount the last couple weeks and it seems to be accurate. I tested this scale up against the scales at my Gym and the grocery stores and it's the same. This scale also easily takes your weight as soon as you step on it unlike some scales I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: nick v

customer_reviews.title: doesnt read right, 10 lbs or more diff.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month. Went from gaining 20 lbs in one week to dropping 10 in two days. Went a while being very upset about the weight i thought i put on but didnt. Had my tiny friend that weighs maybe 100 lbs tell her she was 135 lol, dont waste your money. Go to walmart....
customer_reviews.author: rsturgill17

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the greater good food scale a few months ago...because i started a healthful living journey... and the digital body weight scale, is slim, clear, and simple... the biggest plus...I like your company, I like the way you make it a priority to be ethical, compassionate, and honest. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: RishaF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is great - it is very well designed and looks very sleek. I also love that I don't have to tap it or anything to turn it on - all I have to do is step on it. Right when I took it out of the box I weighed myself twice in a row and got two different weights, but ever since then it's given me the same weight when I step on twice in a row. (might have just been something with the shipping and it had to calibrate) Haven't compared to another scale but seems pretty accurate. I love this and would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek design! Easy to set up...take it out of the box, pull the battery tab and put it on the ground. The numbers are really easy to read. It weighs within a couple of ounces of my last scale and that one was pretty equal to the scale at the doctor office. All around a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Harb

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom scale
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale. It appears accurate. The numbers are easy to read. Wipes clean easily. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: TheMimi

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust "zero"
customer_reviews.text: Like the look & response of this scale. It weighs 3 lb heavier than my previous scale. Not sure which is accurate, but I thought I'd adjust the zero -- and there is no way to do so. I had to take a star off for a scale that says I'm heavier than I thought!
customer_reviews.author: YellowBird

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very easy to use. The white numbers against the black background are very easy to read even in a bright bathroom. This scale seems to be more accurate than my old scale, as I get the same readings several times in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months, then not
customer_reviews.text: I don't review things much and if I do, it's only after a year or two of use to see if the thing lasts that long. This scale was OK for a few months but since then will give you a reading off, randomly in either direction, by about 15-20lbs. Every time you step on it, no matter how you step on it. Basically, it's junk, and don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: ) thank you Balence for a nice scale.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not steadyon my feet and rock when i stand so diffent scales run up & down. my scales arrived today I got on them and the highest number stayed for 3-4 secs. 1st time i got what I consider an accurate wight.scary but lowerr than docs office afer 12 days of hard diet. :) thank you Balence for a nice scale.
customer_reviews.author: Keith clark

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but I'm not sure how much I weigh
customer_reviews.text: Scale gives you different readings. You have to get on and off at least 3 times to get a halfway correct weight. I weighed before going to the doc and the 4th reading matched my doctor's scale.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pruden

product_meta.title: Digital Body Weight Bathroom Scale from GreaterGoods (Black)
feature_bullets: THE RIGHT CHOICE: Sometimes simpler is better. Get just what you need, without compromise.
THE FEATURES YOU NEED: Large, backlit display & sturdy tempered glass top. See Product Description.
BACKED BY REAL SUPPORT: The friendly team at our St. Louis headquarters is here for whatever you need.
MADE THE RIGHT WAY: Your purchase should have a positive impact on all the people involved.

TROUBLESHOOTING: Is your scale weighing 4-5 pounds too heavy? You may need to recalibrate your scale before stepping on - for more tips like this, be sure to check out our Paperless Manual upon receipt.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
